curam.util.persistence
Class ValidationHelper

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.persistence.ValidationHelper

public abstract class ValidationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helps the server application accumulate validation errors.

There may be more than one data field in error, in which case single field validation should try to identify all fields in error, rather than stopping at the first error.

Constructor Detail

ValidationHelper

Method Detail

addValidationError

public static AppException addValidationError(AppException appException)
Adds a validation error and allows processing to continue.

If tracing is set to Trace.kTraceVerbose or higher, the pending error will be logged as an informational message, which may be of help when debugging validation problems.

If tracing is set to Trace.kTraceUltraVerbose or higher, the stack trace of the exception is also output.

Parameters:
appException - The validation error exception object.
Returns:
The exception class, so that callers can call AppException arg() methods.

addValidationError

public static AppException addValidationError(CatEntry catEntry,
                                              java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Adds a validation error and allows processing to continue.

Parameters:
catEntry - The validation error message catalog entry.
throwable - The throwable to nest inside the AppException created, to add extra context to the error.
Returns:
The exception class, so that callers can call AppException arg() methods.

failIfErrorsExist

public static void failIfErrorsExist()
                              throws InformationalException
Interrupts processing if any validation errors have been raised.

Calling code can catch InformationalException and pass it to ValidationHelper.informationalContains(InformationalException, CatEntry) to determine whether a particular validation error is included.

The error list is cleared, so that subsequent calls to this method do not return any previously-raised errors.

Throws:
InformationalException - If any validation errors have been raised.

informationalContains

public static boolean informationalContains(InformationalException informationalException,
                                            CatEntry catEntry)
Identifies whether the validation errors raised contain the catalog entry sought.

Parameters:
informationalException - The top-level error thrown, containing one or more nested validation errors.
catEntry - The particular message catalog entry being sought in the nested validation errors.
Returns:
Whether the top-level error thrown contains the catalog entry sought.
